Class ConversationPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.owasp.webscarab.ui.swing.ConversationPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ConversationPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Creates a Swing JPanel that can be used to display a Request and a Response

Author:
rogan
See Also:
Serialized Form

ConversationPanel

public ConversationPanel()
Creates new form ConversationPanel2

ConversationPanel

public ConversationPanel(ConversationModel model)
Creates new form ConversationPanel2 This form displays a tool bar with previous, next and a dropdown selector to allow for stepping through the conversations in the supplied ConversationModel

Parameters:
model - the conversations to step through
